posts.post_content:
He's really not bad. A 4/4 with First Strike will probably clear out most anything in combat, and if your opponent doesn't have any creatures, he'll be swinging for four and keeping the damage ratio at least even, anyway.
  
   
Furthermore, it is a giant rabbit.

posts.post_content:
Great card, especially in multiplayer. You can play him fairly early, his drawback will nearly never matter in multiplayer, and few people will attack early on into a 4/4 first striker. And it can deal quite some damage too. Late game they are great as well, if you draw into multiplers. Two of them can take out anything with 8 or less toughness without receiving any damage themselves.  
And the art is awesome too.

posts.post_content: Always loved this card. Of course since Tempest came out there are even better cards, but a 4/4 for 4 mana that has 1st strike is pretty amazing. Very efficient creature.
